original_text: And they set the altar upon his bases; for fear was upon them because of the people of those countries: and they offered burnt offerings thereon unto the Lord, even burnt offerings morning and evening.
korean_text: 무리가 모든 나라 백성을 두려워하여 제단을 그 터에 세우고 그 위에서 아침 저녁으로 여호와께 번제를 드리며

sentences.original_text: And they set the altar upon his bases
sentences.korean_translation: 그들이 그 기초 위에 제단을 세웠으니

sentences.original_text: because of the people of those countries
and they offered burnt offerings thereon
even burnt offerings morning and evening
